TEXT.TITLE: FIRST FEDERAL/ARKANSAS <FARK> IN COURT RULING
TEXT.BODY: First Federal Savings of Arkansas FA said a federal district court denied a motion seeking class-action status for a lawsuit that alleges the bank violated securities laws in an offering of common stock. The lawsuit alleges that First Federal violated securities laws in connection with its initial public offering. Reuter
